project.name: agent-skills
project.description: Extensible skill collection for AI agents like Claude. Built with 57 React performance optimization rules, 100+ Web design guidelines, and one-click Vercel deployment.

features.title: Why agent-skills?
features.subtitle: Official Vercel skills that package engineering team best practices into reusable capabilities for AI agents.

list.title: React Performance Optimization
list.desc: 57 Vercel-verified rules organized by CRITICAL/HIGH/MEDIUM priority, covering waterfall elimination, bundle optimization, and 8 categories.

list.title: Web Design Guidelines
list.desc: 100+ UI audit rules covering accessibility, animation performance, dark mode, form validation, and more.

list.title: Vercel One-Click Deploy
list.desc: Auto-detects 40+ frameworks, zero-config deployment with preview URLs and ownership transfer links.

list.title: Auto-Triggering
list.desc: After installation, agents automatically identify tasks and activate corresponding skills without manual selection.

list.title: Standardized Format
list.desc: Follows Agent Skills spec with SKILL.md, scripts/, and references/ for easy extension.

list.title: Open Source & Extensible
list.desc: MIT licensed for free customization or building your own skill packs on existing rules.
